original_title: Merci, merci, merci (Jouir malgré tout, opus 1)
overview: White bread female masturbation, filmed with a (live) background of french first lady Bernadette Chirac on a talk show: channel surfing required, as vapidity is even less erotic than the litany of death in the news.
title: Merci, merci, merci (Jouir malgré tout, opus 1)
